::Spears::

She nodded, "As you command, my master. Ramulus will be yours very 
soon." She kissed Prebon's ckeek again, "Thank you very much for you 
mercy, master."

She took his arm and smiled at him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon
> 
> Prebon smiled at Spears.
> 
> "Thank you, but it is not neccesary. I did not enjoy showing mercy, 
> and I will not again. Get ready though. In two mega-cycles we go 
and 
> find Ramulus. If everything goes well, Striker will go, and without 
> memories of ever knowing you."
